metadata.Title: CVE-2022-47673 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Binutils addr2line before 2.39.3, function parse_module contains multiple out of bound reads which may cause a denial of service or other unspecified impacts.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> binutils isn't safe for untrusted inputs. ccdm94> the fix for this issue seems to be the same as the one for the issue described by CVE-2023-25584.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'changes too intrusive').
